document_data.mainbody:
Faerlaur Onthim was a senior member of the Sembian cell of the Cult of the Dragon during the late 14 century DR. As one of the Wearers of Purple, Faerlaur served on the leadership council that guided the Cults operations in the region of Sembia, Cormanthyr, and the southern Dalelands.
Although he claimed to be a cleric of both Cyric and Shar, Faerlaur was in fact a worshiper of Tiamat.
Faerlaur held the title of High Dragonservant which was akin to High Priest. He ran the secret Temple of the Cult of the Dragon within Urmlaspyr in Sembia in 1358 DR.
